text:
With Waikiki being one of Hawaii's premier locations, filled with tourists, but also home to a lot of crime and homelessness, the Waikiki Business Improvement District decided it was time to amp up security.

Read here for more info: https://tinyurl.com/3vkd82yx¬†

‚ÄúI wish we could go back to the way things were‚Äù is a deeply privileged mindset to hold.

Racial profiling. Food insecurity. Homelessness. These were all part of the way things were.

Do you want better? Or do you just wanna go back to when you didn‚Äôt know how bad things are?

Phoenix voters recently approved a law that says they can get their property taxes refunded if the police don't enforce laws against homelessness. Arizona loves the police so much they defund the schools when the police don't do their jobs.
